all.title: Chat-APP
all.description: A modern Chat-app platform built with React, User registration with name, phone, and password , User authentication using JWT,Profile management, User online/offline status (Coming in Sept 2025),Group Features, Create new groups, Add/remove members, Multiple admins support, Group media sharing (Coming in Sept 2025), Group search functionality (Coming in Oct 2025),Chat Features, Real-time messaging, Text messages support, Image/file sharing (Coming in Sept 2025), Message deletion (Coming in Sept 2025) , Read receipts (Coming in Oct 2025)

all.title: Media Broker
all.description: Media Broker is a web application that streamlines media management and email creation. It features a mail builder with customizable templates, user-friendly design, and efficient tools to organize, edit, and deliver content seamlessly.

all.title: E-commerce Website
all.description: A responsive e-commerce website built with pure HTML and CSS. Features a clean design, product showcase, and user-friendly layout optimized for different devices.

all.title: Animation Landing Page
all.description: An interactive landing page built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It features smooth animations, modern UI design, and a fully responsive layout to deliver an engaging user experience.
